assetSelector.info: Your pooling balance is independent of trading activity and can be utilized at any time.
assetSelector.assetInfo: Only assets that can be pooled will be displayed in the list.

poolSelector.info: Your redemption balance depends on amounts settled in your wallet. Settlement cycles happen daily at end of CET business day (GMT+1)

deposit.info_one: You will receive {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} token for pooling {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} token.
deposit.info_other: You will receive {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} tokens for pooling {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} tokens.

summary.title: You pool
summary.placeholderText: Add assets on the pool list
summary.feesDescription: Fees are deducted from your EUR balance. Those are equivalent to 0.5% of the pooled amount.

deposit.loadingHint: Pooling may take up to 1 min. Please wait until process is completed.
deposit.successSubtitle: Your balances have been updated. There could be delays in displaying transactions in the history.

redeem.info_one: You will receive {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} token for redeeming {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} token.
redeem.info_other: You will receive {{assetValue}} {{assetName}} tokens for redeeming {{poolAssetValue}} {{poolAssetName}} tokens.

summary.title: You redeem
summary.placeholderText: Add assets on the redeem list
summary.feesDescription: Fees are deducted from your EUR balance. Those are equivalent to 0.5% of the redeemed amount.

redeem.loadingHint: Redeeming may take up to 1 min. Please wait until process is completed.
redeem.successSubtitle: Your balances have been updated. There could be delays in displaying transactions in the history.
